response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality, luxury, and functionality. Given its immense value to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to secure this masterpiece at a significant discount compared to its market value. I believe this offer presents a mutually beneficial arrangement, allowing us to share the value we've created together. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
